amendment.description: Amendment ensures medically-tailored nutrition interventions are inc luded in evidence-based practices for enhancing senior nutrition under the Older Americans Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to ensure medically-tailored nutrition interventions are included in evidence-based practices for enhancing senior nutrition under the Older Americans Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 338 - 83 (Roll no. 251).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 338 - 83 (Roll no. 251).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. McGovern.
